ComicInfo.Title: The Book of Judgment
ComicInfo.Summary: Jeremy Skagg is about to be arrested by F.I.S.H. and the angelic being reveals her true form to him. Jeremy is in utter shock and just can't believe that he wasn't actually being led by the word of God. Oh yeah, and he does get arrested but is allowed to make a speech to his followers on his behalf.Meanwhile the Elementals were trounced by The Rapture last issue. Morningstar awakens and thaws Fathom from her ice statue state. Vortex and Tommy awaken too and the four attack The Rapture without holding back. The remaining Rapture members are taken into custody.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-14 13:30:25. [CVDB31378]
ComicInfo.Characters: Benjamin Franklin Richter, David Golden, Exodus 10:21, Fathom, Genesis 6:4, Isaiah 6:2, Jeremy Skagg, Judges 15:14, Lawrence Cartajel, Leviticus 26:22, Matthew 27:51, Monolith, Morningstar, Ratman, Shapeshifter, Terry Wise, Vortex
